title: Dev Blog: The Animation of Poppy

replies.body: Awesome, now the only one left {{champion:117}}  :D:D

Do not believe what this guy sends. I've seen his profile, and all his comments are leading to the same scam. It steals money from your phone. If a rito employee sees this please remove his links.
Ty.
Why do {{champion:78}} arms stretch in that last video???
It's deliberately animated that way to emphasise the power behind the swing. If you can find a video of {{champion:122}} ulting he has the exact same motion at the very peak of the over head swing.
yes they do, when he gets that little sparkle of light signifying attack is complete and nothing can no longer stop it, his arms stretch
Same with Zac's Q! Kappa

Zac's everything
FTFY
Oh yeah thats really weird {{summoner:31}}
Just think about it like an afterimage. Or just don't try to think to hard too.

I really do like the facial animations you gave to her, i really do hope you guys keep up the good work and make the new champ/reworks (and their skins of course) skins also include this feature. I just love to zoom in and watch her facial expressions while i wait for the game to start. And even during the game i like it how is give a very realistic looking "battle" quote when she goes to fight. She actually looks like she is trying to make conversation when she emote. I also really love it how her jokes flow and its not just a repeat of the exact same line over and over. This an awesome feature, adding a real depth of personality to characters in game and I really do hope you guys keep it up.


(Maybe you guys could give yasuo a nice "model rework"(facial animations))
A very interesting read. I'm currently studying 3D Animation in Auckland, and there were some interesting methods mentioned here.
A little unrelated but, WHOOO AUCKLAND FTW
Pls, Wellington is the capital for a reason :3
Auckland used to be capital {{item:3070}}
Na Na Na Hamilton FTW
MDS by any chance? Just finished my bachelor there :)
I wish, its a school on the middle of Queen Street. Not one of the bigger names like MDS or Animation College ;)

there has been "talk" of making a little minion army of ghouls that travel with him
what program do you guys use to animate and model?

I really would like to know. Im currently studying games development and am interested in the software behind riot games. But i'm assuming Maya or 3ds max alongside Zbrush or roadkill? Please correct me if im wrong..

yeh... They actually use the paint tool that comes stock with most PCs these days.
Let me now how it goes for yah :)

I really like Poppy's new design, but it feels slightly overdone compared to all the other champions in League of Legends. What gives me this feeling would hands down be Poppy's face and the obvious amount of effort that went into giving her so much character, but it stands out on a level that might make it more annoying than just eye-candy (plus her eyes seem very large, but maybe that's just me?).

I don't find her annoying at all. To be honest, she's kind of cute. A few of the Yordles have large eyes (such as Amumu {{champion:32}} , Teemo {{champion:17}}  and Tristana {{champion:18}} ). It's an attempt to make the champion seem cuter and less human-like.
Amumu{{champion:32}} is a YORDLE??!!   What is this maddness!

Maybe Teemo{{champion:17}}  would have large eyes if he opened them.
but for now he is just a squinty little fluff ball of rage
Now all you need to do is give {{champion:432}} facial expressions...... Somehow

The facial expressions look Jak and Daxter-esque I love it :D
It's that perfect kind of cartoonish realism, it really suits poppy!
Jack and daxter wAS THE SHIT
Holy crap I know right
Now we just wait for the Taric {{champion:44}} rework
AWESOME!!!!
I haven't got a brain {{champion:9}}
whats with the voice revert {{item:3070}} {{item:3151}}  pref the new do over to thee ol one haha {{champion:78}}
